title: Samsung Galaxy S20 FE is a threat to which smartphones? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Galaxy S20 FE is created to fight the One Plus 8, 8 Pro and the upcoming 8T series. It will undoubtedly also compete with devices like the Mi 10 5G, Oppo Reno 10x and the iPhone 11 and the upcoming budget iPhone 12.
